content.question: The trend shown in the graph between the 1900s and the 1940s can best be described as a result of

choices.label: a boost in educational opportunities in Northern states
an increase in the demand for jobs in Northern cities
an influx of migrants from Afro-Caribbean regions
an improvement in Southern agriculture production

content.answer: an increase in the demand for jobs in Northern cities

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
